name: All-Star Baseball 2000
description:
All-Star Baseball 2000 is an action game. It was originally released in 1999.
All-Star Baseball 2000 is available on Game Boy Color and Nintendo 64.
Darrin Stubbington and Jaime Grieves produced the game. It was directed by Bey Bickerton. Darren Mitchell, Kirk Winterrowd, Marc Schaefgen and Rick Fox scored the game.
